title: [LOVE] Ep. 12: Get In Touch With Your Heart w/Evan Marc Katz
description:
“Once you wake up, you can’t go back to sleep.”

 We all want to be in happy, healthy, satisfying relationships… so how do we get there? On this week’s episode of the You Turn Podcast, dating and relationship expert/author Evan Marc Katz divulges the secrets to finding your best relationship and being blissfully happy. He and Ashley dive in to the differences between men and women, the universality of online dating, the importance of communication, and more! Be more intentional when it comes to your relationships, learn how to take action (whether you’re single or taken), and really tap in to your heart. Don’t forget to stay tuned for Ashley’s post-episode thoughts!

I Can’t Believe I’m Buying This Book, Evan Marc Katz

Why You’re Still Single, Evan Marc Katz

A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life’s Purpose, Eckhart Tolle 

Find all of Evan Marc Katz’s resources, including his blog, on his website, evanmarckatz.com
